header.switchInstanceAriaLabel: Current instance: {{instanceName}}. Click to switch instances.

setup.description: Create your account to get started

username.minLength: Username must be at least 3 characters

password.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

toast.premiumError: This is a premium theme. Please purchase a license to use it.

notFound.title: Oops! Lost in the swarm?
notFound.description: Looks like you've ventured into the unknown.
notFound.bugReport: In case you think this is a bug rather than a missing link,
notFound.feelFree: feel free to report this to our
notFound.getBack: Otherwise, let us help you get back on track!

add_torrent_dialog.title: Add New Torrent
add_torrent_dialog.description: Add a torrent file or magnet link to start downloading

file_input.label: Torrent Files
file_input.validation: Please select at least one torrent file

url_input.label: URLs / Magnet Links
url_input.placeholder: Enter URLs or magnet links (one per line)
url_input.validation: Please enter at least one URL or magnet link

tags.search_placeholder: Create new tag or search available tags...

save_path.label: Save Path
save_path.tmm_enabled: Automatic Torrent Management is enabled. Save path will be determined by category settings.

rename.label: Rename torrent
rename.placeholder: Leave empty to use original name

toasts.premium_theme_error: This is a premium theme. Please purchase a license to use it.

trackers.title: Active Trackers
trackers.incognito_message: Tracker message hidden in incognito mode

add_peers.title: Add Peers
add_peers.description: Add one or more peers to this torrent. Enter each peer as IP:port, one per line or comma-separated.

ban_peer.title: Ban Peer Permanently
ban_peer.description: Are you sure you want to permanently ban this peer? This action cannot be undone.

delete.description: This action cannot be undone. The torrents will be removed from qBittorrent.
delete.description_with_size: This action cannot be undone. Total size: {{size}}

recheck.description: This will force qBittorrent to recheck all pieces of the selected torrents. This process may take some time and will temporarily pause the torrents.

reannounce.description: This will force the selected torrents to reannounce to all their trackers. This is useful when trackers are not responding or you want to refresh your connection.

torrent_table_optimized.torrents_loaded_of_total: {{loaded}} of {{total}} torrents loaded • Scroll to load more
torrent_table_optimized.delete_torrents_body: This action cannot be undone. The torrents will be removed from qBittorrent.
torrent_table_optimized.recheck_torrents_body: This will force qBittorrent to recheck all pieces of the selected torrents. This process may take some time and will temporarily pause the torrents.
torrent_table_optimized.reannounce_torrents_body: This will force the selected torrents to reannounce to all their trackers. This is useful when trackers are not responding or you want to refresh your connection.
torrent_table_optimized.loading_from_instance: Loading torrents from instance... (no cache available)
torrent_table_optimized.delete_torrents_body_with_size: This action cannot be undone. The torrents will be removed from qBittorrent. Total size: {{size}}

dialog.addDescription: Add a new qBittorrent instance to manage

name.label: Instance Name
name.placeholder: e.g., Main Server or Home qBittorrent

url.protocol: Only HTTP and HTTPS protocols are supported
url.portRequired: Port is required when using an IP address (e.g., :8080)

tls.label: Skip TLS Certificate Verification
tls.description: Allow connections to qBittorrent instances that use self-signed or otherwise untrusted certificates.

authBypass.label: Authentication Bypass
authBypass.description: Enable when qBittorrent bypasses authentication for localhost or whitelisted IPs

qbitAuth.passwordPlaceholderExisting: Leave empty to keep current password

basicAuth.label: HTTP Basic Authentication
basicAuth.description: Enable if your qBittorrent is behind a reverse proxy with Basic Auth
basicAuth.required: Basic auth password is required when basic auth is enabled

notifications.updateSuccessDescription: Instance updated successfully. Connection testing in background...
notifications.createSuccessDescription: Instance created successfully. Connection testing in background...

deleteDialog.title: Delete Instance
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

notifications.testErrorDescription: Could not connect to qBittorrent instance

errorDisplay.decryptionError: Unable to decrypt saved password. This usually happens when the session secret has changed.

passwordIssues.title: Password Issues Detected
passwordIssues.description: Some instances cannot decrypt their saved passwords, likely due to a configuration change. Check the affected instances below to resolve this issue.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of all your qBittorrent instances

instances.getStarted: Get started by adding your first qBittorrent instance

altSpeed.enabledTooltip: Alternative speed limits enabled (turtle mode) - Click to toggle
altSpeed.disabledTooltip: Alternative speed limits disabled (normal mode) - Click to toggle
altSpeed.enableDescription: This will enable alternative speed limits for {{name}}, which will reduce transfer speeds based on your configured limits.
altSpeed.disableDescription: This will disable alternative speed limits for {{name}} and return to normal speed limits.

instancePreferences.title: Instance Preferences
instancePreferences.description: Configure all settings and preferences for {{name}}

speedLimits.title: Speed Limits
speedLimits.description: Configure download and upload speed limits for this qBittorrent instance
speedLimits.scheduler: Schedule the use of alternative rate limits

validation.globalDownload: Global download rate limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
validation.globalUpload: Global upload rate limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
validation.altDownload: Alternative download rate limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
validation.altUpload: Alternative upload rate limit must be greater than 0 or disabled

queueManagement.title: Queue Management
queueManagement.description: Configure torrent queue settings and active torrent limits
queueManagement.enableQueueingDescription: Limit the number of active torrents
queueManagement.maxCheckingTorrentsDescription: Maximum number of torrents being checked at the same time

validation.maxActiveDownloads: Maximum active downloads must be greater than -1
validation.maxActiveUploads: Maximum active uploads must be greater than -1
validation.maxActiveTorrents: Maximum active torrents must be greater than -1

fileManagement.title: File Management
fileManagement.description: Configure file paths and torrent management settings
fileManagement.startPausedDescription: New torrents start in paused state
fileManagement.defaultContentLayoutDescription: How torrent files are organized within the save directory

notifications.saveError: Failed to update file management settings

seedingLimits.title: Seeding Limits
seedingLimits.description: Configure share ratio and seeding time limits
seedingLimits.enableRatioLimitDescription: Stop seeding when ratio is reached
seedingLimits.maxRatioDescription: Stop seeding at this upload/download ratio
seedingLimits.maxTimeDescription: Stop seeding after this many minutes

connectionSettings.title: Connection Settings
connectionSettings.description: Configure listening port, protocol settings, and connection limits

limitedDetails.title: Limited version details
limitedDetails.description: We couldn't confirm this instance's qBittorrent build details, so all connection options are visible. Double-check applicability before applying changes.

port.title: Listening Port
port.portRangeDescription: Port used for incoming BitTorrent connections
port.randomPort: Use random port on each startup
port.randomPortDescription: Randomly select a port when qBittorrent starts
port.upnpDescription: Automatically forward port through your router
port.upnpLeaseDescription: Duration in minutes for UPnP lease (0 for permanent, libtorrent 2.x only)

validation.portRange: The port used for incoming connections must be between 0 and 65535

protocol.title: Protocol Settings
protocol.bittorrentProtocolDescription: Protocol to use for peer connections
protocol.mixedModeDescription: How to handle mixed μTP/TCP connections

networkInterface.title: Network Interface
networkInterface.interfaceDescription: Currently active network interface. Configuration requires missing API endpoints.
networkInterface.addressDescription: IP address of the current interface. Configuration requires missing API endpoints.
networkInterface.reannounce: Re-announce to trackers when IP address changes
networkInterface.reannounceDescription: Automatically re-announce when your IP address changes

limits.title: Connection Limits
limits.globalUploadSlotsDescription: Maximum upload slots across all torrents
limits.perTorrentUploadSlotsDescription: Maximum upload slots per individual torrent
limits.allowMultipleConnections: Allow multiple connections from the same IP address
limits.allowMultipleConnectionsDescription: Enable connections from multiple peers behind the same NAT

validation.globalMax: Maximum number of connections limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
validation.perTorrentMax: Maximum number of connections per torrent limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
validation.globalUploadSlots: Global number of upload slots limit must be greater than 0 or disabled
validation.perTorrentUploadSlots: Maximum number of upload slots per torrent limit must be greater than 0 or disabled

outgoingPorts.title: Outgoing Ports
outgoingPorts.minDescription: Minimum port for outgoing connections (0 = no limit)
outgoingPorts.maxDescription: Maximum port for outgoing connections (0 = no limit)

validation.min: Outgoing port range minimum must be between 0 and 65535
validation.max: Outgoing port range maximum must be between 0 and 65535

ipFiltering.title: IP Filtering
ipFiltering.enableDescription: Filter specific IP addresses from connecting
ipFiltering.pathDescription: Path to IP filter file (.dat, .p2p, .p2b formats)
ipFiltering.applyToTrackersDescription: Also filter tracker connections based on IP filter rules
ipFiltering.bannedIPsDescription: Add IP addresses to permanently ban from connecting (one per line)
ipFiltering.bannedIPsPlaceholder:
Enter IP addresses to ban (one per line):
192.168.1.100
10.0.0.50
2001:db8::1

networkDiscovery.title: Network Discovery
networkDiscovery.description: Configure peer discovery protocols and tracker settings

peerDiscovery.title: Peer Discovery
peerDiscovery.dhtDescription: Distributed Hash Table for finding peers without trackers
peerDiscovery.pexDescription: Exchange peer lists with other peers
peerDiscovery.lsdDescription: Find peers on your local network

tracker.title: Tracker Settings
tracker.allTiersDescription: Announce to all tracker tiers simultaneously
tracker.allTrackers: Always announce to all trackers in a tier
tracker.allTrackersDescription: Announce to all trackers in a tier simultaneously

privacy.title: Security & Privacy
privacy.encryptionDescription: Protocol encryption helps bypass ISP traffic shaping
privacy.anonymousModeDescription: Hide your client identification and version
privacy.resolveCountriesDescription: Show country flags for peers (requires additional bandwidth)

notifications.saveError: Failed to update network discovery settings

advancedSettings.title: Advanced Settings
advancedSettings.description: Performance tuning, disk I/O, peer management, and security settings

showAll.title: Showing all advanced options
showAll.description: We couldn't determine this instance's qBittorrent version, so every advanced setting is displayed. Some options might not apply to your environment.

tracker.title: Tracker Settings
tracker.announceIP: IP address reported to trackers (requires restart)
tracker.announceIPDescription: IP address to announce to trackers (leave empty for auto-detect)

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.limitUTP: Apply rate limit to μTP protocol
performance.limitUTPDescription: Limit μTP connections to prevent flooding LAN peers
performance.limitTCPOverhead: Apply rate limit to transport overhead
performance.limitTCPOverheadDescription: Include protocol overhead in rate limiting calculations
performance.limitUTPRate: Apply rate limit to μTP connections
performance.limitUTPRateDescription: Apply upload/download limits to μTP connections
performance.peerTOSDescription: Type of Service byte for peer connections
performance.socketBacklogDescription: Number of pending connections in socket backlog
performance.sendBufferWatermarkDescription: Upper watermark for socket send buffer
performance.sendBufferLowWatermarkDescription: Lower watermark for socket send buffer
performance.requestQueueDescription: Maximum number of queued piece requests

diskIO.title: Disk I/O & Memory
diskIO.coalesceReadWriteDescription: Combine adjacent disk reads and writes for better performance
diskIO.asyncThreadsDescription: Number of threads for asynchronous I/O operations
diskIO.hashingThreadsDescription: Number of threads for piece hash checking
diskIO.filePoolDescription: Maximum number of open file handles in pool
diskIO.diskCacheTTLDescription: How long to keep cached data in memory
diskIO.diskQueueDescription: Maximum bytes queued for disk I/O
diskIO.checkingMemoryDescription: Maximum memory used for piece checking
diskIO.workingSetLimitDescription: Physical memory working set size limit

validation.checkingMemory: Outstanding memory when checking torrents must be greater than 0 and less than 1024

peerManagement.title: Peer Management
peerManagement.turnoverIntervalDescription: How often to perform peer turnover

validation.turnover: Peer turnover must be between 0 and 100
validation.turnoverCutoff: Peer turnover cutoff must be between 0 and 100
validation.turnoverInterval: Peer turnover interval must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than 3600 seconds

security.title: Security & IP Filtering
security.filterPathDescription: Path to IP filter file (supports P2P, eMule, and PeerGuardian formats)
security.filterTrackersDescription: Apply IP filtering to tracker connections
security.bannedIPsDescription: List of banned IP addresses or ranges (one per line). Supports CIDR notation.
security.blockPrivilegedPortsDescription: Block connections from peers using ports below 1024

notifications.saveError: Failed to update advanced network settings

proxyType.label: Proxy Type
proxyType.description: Select proxy type for routing connections

server.title: Proxy Server
server.label: Proxy Server
server.description: Proxy server hostname or IP address

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.label: Use authentication
authentication.description: Enable if your proxy server requires username/password

options.title: Proxy Options
options.peerConnectionsDescription: Route BitTorrent peer connections through proxy
options.torrentsOnlyDescription: Only use proxy for BitTorrent traffic, not for other connections
options.hostnameLookupDescription: Resolve hostnames through the proxy server

toasts.update_url_success: Updated tracker URL across all affected torrents

tooltips.selection_tips_content: Left click cycles include and neutral. Cmd/Ctrl + click toggles exclusion.

create_tag.title: Create New Tag
create_tag.description: Enter a name for the new tag
create_tag.label: Tag Name

delete_tag.title: Delete Tag
delete_tag.description: Are you sure you want to delete the tag "{{tag}}"? This action cannot be undone.

create_category.title: Create New Category
create_category.description: Enter details for the new category

edit_category.title: Edit Category: {{name}}
edit_category.description: Update the save path for this category

delete_category.title: Delete Category
delete_category.description: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{{name}}"? Torrents in this category will become uncategorized.

delete_unused_tags.title: Delete Unused Tags
delete_unused_tags.no_unused: There are no unused tags to delete.
delete_unused_tags.confirm_one: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} unused tag? This action cannot be undone.
delete_unused_tags.confirm_other: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} unused tags? This action cannot be undone.

tag_category_management_dialogs.title: Remove Empty Categories
tag_category_management_dialogs.no_empty: There are no empty categories to remove.
tag_category_management_dialogs.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{count}} empty category? This action cannot be undone.
tag_category_management_dialogs.confirm_plural: Are you sure you want to remove {{count}} empty categories? This action cannot be undone.

add_tags.title: Add Tags to {{count}} torrent
add_tags.description: Select existing tags or create new ones to add to the selected torrents.

set_tags.title: Set Tags for {{count}} torrent
set_tags.description: Replace all current tags on the selected torrents with a new set of tags.

remove_tags.title: Remove Tags from {{count}} torrent
remove_tags.description: Select which tags to remove from the selected torrents. This action cannot be undone.

set_location.title: Set Location for {{count}} torrent
set_location.description: Change the save location for the selected torrents. This will move the files on disk.

set_category.title: Set Category for {{count}} torrent
set_category.description: Choose an existing category or create a new one to assign to the selected torrents.

create_category.title: Create & Assign New Category
create_category.description: Create a new category and assign it to the selected {{count}} torrent(s).

edit_tracker.title: Edit Tracker URLs for "{{tracker}}"
edit_tracker.description: Find and replace tracker URLs for the tracker "{{tracker}}". This is useful for updating announce URLs when a tracker changes domains.
edit_tracker.multiple_urls_found: Multiple URLs found for this tracker. Please select the one you want to replace.
edit_tracker.enter_full_url_note: Enter the full URL of the tracker you wish to replace.
edit_tracker.enter_new_full_url_note: Enter the new full URL you want to use for this tracker.
edit_tracker.note_description: When no torrents are selected, this will update ALL torrents that use this tracker. This operation cannot be undone.

share_limits.title: Set Share Limits for {{count}} torrent
share_limits.description: Configure the share ratio and seeding time limits for the selected torrents.
share_limits.use_global_limits_description: Use the global share limits configured in your qBittorrent settings.
share_limits.ratio_limit_description: Stop seeding when this ratio is reached.
share_limits.seeding_time_limit_description: Stop seeding when this time is reached.
share_limits.inactive_seeding_limit_description: Stop seeding torrents that have been inactive for this long.

speed_limits.title: Set Speed Limits for {{count}} torrent
speed_limits.description: Set the upload and download speed limits for the selected torrents (in KB/s).

settings.description: Manage your application preferences and security

newPassword.label: New Password
newPassword.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

notifications.error: Failed to change password. Please check your current password.

dateTime.title: Date & Time Preferences
dateTime.description: Configure timezone, date format, and time display preferences

timeZone.title: Timezone
timeZone.description: Select your local timezone for accurate time display

dateFormat.title: Date Format
dateFormat.label: Date Format
dateFormat.description: Choose how dates are displayed throughout the application

preview.title: Preview
preview.description: This is how dates and times will appear in the application

notifications.error: Failed to update date & time preferences

themes.title: Theme Selection
themes.description: Choose from available themes. Premium themes require a valid license.

notLoaded.description: Configure THEMES_REPO_TOKEN and run make themes-fetch.

requiresLicense.title: This theme requires a premium license
requiresLicense.description: Please purchase a license to access premium themes

premiumToast.title: This is a premium theme.
premiumToast.description: Please purchase a license to use it.

license.title: License Management
license.description: Manage your theme license and premium access

statusDescription.active: You have access to all current and future premium themes
statusDescription.activationRequired: Your license needs to be activated on this machine

license.validationFailed: License validation failed. This may occur if the license was activated on another machine or if the database was copied. To deactivate on another machine, visit

deleteDialog.title: Release License Key
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove this license? You will lose access to all premium themes and the license can be used elsewhere.
deleteDialog.label: License Key to Release:
deleteDialog.recover: If needed, you can recover it later from your

addDialog.title: Add Premium License
addDialog.description: Enter your premium theme license key to unlock all premium themes.
addDialog.label: License Key
addDialog.placeholder: Enter your premium theme license key

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage API keys for external access
apiKeys.mainDescription: API keys allow external applications to access your qBittorrent instances.

createDialog.title: Create API Key
createDialog.description: Give your API key a descriptive name to remember its purpose.
createDialog.saveWarning: Save this key now. You won't be able to see it again.

deleteDialog.title: Delete API Key?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. Any applications using this key will lose access.

clientApiKeys.title: Client Proxy API Keys
clientApiKeys.description: Manage API keys for external applications to connect to qBittorrent instances through qui
clientApiKeys.empty: No client API keys created yet

error.load: Unable to load client API keys
error.unavailable: Feature may not be available in this version

createDialog.title: Create Client API Key
createDialog.description: Create an API key for a specific client to connect to a qBittorrent instance.
createDialog.successDescription: This information is shown only once. Store it in your password manager before closing the dialog.

clientName.label: Client Name
clientName.placeholder: e.g., autobrr, tqm, sonarr, radarr, cross-seed

deleteDialog.title: Delete Client API Key?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. Any applications using this key will lose access to the qBittorrent instance.

notifications.createError: Failed to create client API key
notifications.deleteError: Failed to delete client API key: {{error}}

updateAvailable.title: Update available
updateAvailable.description: Reload to apply the latest qui release.

updated.title: qui updated
updated.description: Reload when convenient to finish installing the latest release.

toasts.delete_failed: Failed to delete torrent creation task

torrent_creator_dialog.title: Create Torrent
torrent_creator_dialog.description: Create a new .torrent file from a file or folder on the server

source_path.label: Source Path
source_path.description: Full path on the server where qBittorrent is running
source_path.tooltip: Windows users: use double backslashes (e.g., C:\\Data\\folder)

private.label: Private torrent
private.description: Disable DHT, PEX, and local peer discovery

trackers.label: Trackers
trackers.description: Select from your active trackers or paste custom URLs below
trackers.placeholder: Add tracker from your active torrents

start_seeding.label: Add to qBittorrent
start_seeding.description: Add the created torrent to qBittorrent and start seeding. If disabled, only creates the .torrent file for download.

format.label: Torrent Format
format.description: v1 for maximum compatibility, v2 for modern clients, hybrid for both

piece_size.label: Piece Size
piece_size.description: Auto calculates optimal size based on content

save_path.label: Save .torrent to (optional)
save_path.description: Where to save the .torrent file on the server
save_path.tooltip: qBittorrent needs write access to this directory. Best to leave blank and download the .torrent file from the tasks modal later.

web_seeds.label: Web Seeds (HTTP/HTTPS)
web_seeds.description: HTTP/HTTPS URLs where the content can be downloaded. One URL per line.

licenseErrors.noLongerActive: This license key is no longer active.
licenseErrors.notFound: The license key you entered is not valid.
licenseErrors.conditionsNotMet: This license was activated on a different machine. The database appears to have been copied.
licenseErrors.doesNotMatch: License key does not match required conditions.
licenseErrors.activationLimitExceeded: License activation limit has been reached. Please deactivate on another machine at {{polarPortalUrl}}
licenseErrors.limitReached: License activation limit has been reached.
licenseErrors.tooManyRequests: Too many attempts. Please wait a moment and try again.
licenseErrors.default: Failed to validate license key. Please try again.
